description: Luxury Town Houses with 'The Row on French'. This unit 3 bed, 2 bath and den, is in Building 4 This project is located in a quiet and beautiful area, in the heart of Marpole. Located minutes away from Oakridge Park, restaurants, golf courses and parks. Featuring a stunning kitchen with Stainless appliances from Bosch, a gas cook top, and quartz counters. The units heating system is a heat pump, which allows you to enjoy air conditioning during the warm months. 1 parking spot and 1 storgage room. Call us for a viewing of this amazing project
